summary: The U.S. Center for SafeSport is an independent nonprofit responsible for protecting amateur athletes from emotional, physical, and sexual misconduct in the U.S. Olympic and Paralympic communities. Congress requires that the Center be independent from the U.S. Olympic Committee in a number of ways. title: Amateur Athlete Safety: Certification Related to the Independence of the U.S. Center for SafeSport for Fiscal Year 2020
